Quote.Author: George R. R. Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: I suppose I'm a lapsed Catholic. You would consider me an atheist or agnostic

Quote.Author: George R. R. Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: There has to be a level of joy of what you're doing

Quote.Author: George R. R. Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: Writing is hard. I mean, I sit there and work at it

Quote.Author: George R. R. Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always been a dark writer

Quote.Author: George R. R. Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: I have an instinctual distrust of conventional happy endings

Quote.Author: George R. R. Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't write outlines; I hate outlines

Quote.Author: George Saunders
Quote.QuoteValue: We try, we fail, we posture, we aspire, we pontificate - and then we age, shrink, die, and vanish

Quote.Author: George Saunders
Quote.QuoteValue: Nostalgia is, 'Hey, remember the other mall that used to be there?'

Quote.Author: George Saunders
Quote.QuoteValue: Irony is just honesty with the volume cranked up

Quote.Author: George Saunders
Quote.QuoteValue: So I may not have had a gothic childhood, but childhood makes its own gothicity

Quote.Author: George Saunders
Quote.QuoteValue: Character is that sum total of moments we can't explain

Quote.Author: George Saunders
Quote.QuoteValue: It's funny with fiction - once you cut something, it hasn't happened anymore

Quote.Author: George Saunders
Quote.QuoteValue: When I write I know that I'm going to have to produce 40 percent more than I need

Quote.Author: George Saunders
Quote.QuoteValue: If you haven't read you don't have the voice. The lack of voice eliminates experience

Quote.Author: George Saunders
Quote.QuoteValue: Back in 1992, I had my first story accepted by 'The New Yorker.'

Quote.Author: George Saunders
Quote.QuoteValue: Chekhov - shall I be blunt? - is the greatest short story writer who ever lived

Quote.Author: George Strait
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had great fans, and they've been so loyal over the years

Quote.Author: George Strait
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't have to be a cheater to sing a cheatin' song, that's what I'm saying

Quote.Author: George Strait
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to reach the point where people hear my name and immediately think of real country music

Quote.Author: George Strait
Quote.QuoteValue: I like people who are loyal to me, and I like to be loyal, too

Quote.Author: George Strait
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, traditional country music is something that's going to be around forever

Quote.Author: George Strait
Quote.QuoteValue: Sinatra, in my opinion, is possibly the greatest male singer of all time

Quote.Author: George Strait
Quote.QuoteValue: If twang isn't what I do, I don't know what is

Quote.Author: George Strait
Quote.QuoteValue: Bob Wills and the Texas Playboys are simply the best band that ever was

Quote.Author: George Strait
Quote.QuoteValue: Country music is important to me, and I love it, but it's not my whole life

Quote.Author: George Strait
Quote.QuoteValue: I think 'Beyond the Blue Neon' is the best I've ever done

Quote.Author: George Takei
Quote.QuoteValue: I intend to live life, not just exist

Quote.Author: George Takei
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time we had a hot war going on in Asia, it was difficult for Asian Americans here

Quote.Author: George Takei
Quote.QuoteValue: My memories of camp - I was four years old to eight years old - they're fond memories

Quote.Author: George Takei
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, I grew up in two American internment camps, and at that time I was very young

Quote.Author: George Takei
Quote.QuoteValue: I marched back then - I was in a civil-rights musical, Fly Blackbird, and we met Martin Luther King

Quote.Author: George Takei
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, the whole history of Star Trek is the market demand

Quote.Author: George Takei
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a civic busybody and I've been blessed with an active career

Quote.Author: George Takei
Quote.QuoteValue: I've run the marathon several times, so I definitely don't look like the Great Ancestor!

Quote.Author: George Takei
Quote.QuoteValue: To do theater you need to block off a hunk of time

Quote.Author: George Takei
Quote.QuoteValue: STAR TREK is a show that had a vision about a future that was positive

Quote.Author: George Vecsey
Quote.QuoteValue: I love Boston. I love Fenway Park. I love Red Sox history. But in no way am I a Red Sox fan

Quote.Author: George Vecsey
Quote.QuoteValue: I love hockey because of the respect for history and for the game itself

Quote.Author: George Vecsey
Quote.QuoteValue: In New York, Kid Carter was pure vanilla for a city with stronger tastes

Quote.Author: George Vecsey
Quote.QuoteValue: There may not be much future for the kind of sports column I did

Quote.Author: George Vecsey
Quote.QuoteValue: Newspapers are the engines that drive the Web

Quote.Author: George Vecsey
Quote.QuoteValue: Lots of ballplayers have their own personal music blasted by the sound systems in modern ball parks

Quote.Author: George Vecsey
Quote.QuoteValue: Fans all have their memories of pennant races, good memories, sick memories

Quote.Author: George Vecsey
Quote.QuoteValue: As my wife will attest, I do not shop casually

Quote.Author: George Vecsey
Quote.QuoteValue: Most descriptions make Beijing sound overbuilt: not a blade of grass left

Quote.Author: George Vecsey
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing wrong with athletes coming back from retirement

Quote.Author: George Wald
Quote.QuoteValue: I have lived much of my life among molecules. They are good company

Quote.Author: George Wald
Quote.QuoteValue: Nuclear weapons offer us nothing but a balance of terror, and a balance of terror is still terror

Quote.Author: George Wald
Quote.QuoteValue: A physicist is an atom's way of knowing about atoms

Quote.Author: George Wald
Quote.QuoteValue: The only use for an atomic bomb is to keep somebody else from using one

Quote.Author: George Wald
Quote.QuoteValue: Our business is with life, not death

Quote.Author: George Wald
Quote.QuoteValue: I tell my students to try early in life to find an unattainable objective

Quote.Author: George Wald
Quote.QuoteValue: I am growing old, and my future, so to speak, is already behind me

Quote.Author: George Wald
Quote.QuoteValue: Dropping those atomic bombs on Hiroshima and Nagasaki was a war crime

Quote.Author: George Wald
Quote.QuoteValue: A scientist should be the happiest of men

Quote.Author: George Wald
Quote.QuoteValue: We are the products of editing, rather than of authorship

Quote.Author: George Whitefield
Quote.QuoteValue: To preach more than half an hour, a man should be an angel himself or have angels for hearers

Quote.Author: George Whitefield
Quote.QuoteValue: We are immortal until our work on earth is done

Quote.Author: George Whitefield
Quote.QuoteValue: Take care of your life and the Lord will take care of your death

Quote.Author: George Whitefield
Quote.QuoteValue: Fight the good fight of faith, and God will give you spiritual mercies

Quote.Author: George Whitefield
Quote.QuoteValue: Mere heathen morality, and not Jesus Christ, is preached in most of our churches

Quote.Author: George Whitefield
Quote.QuoteValue: Press forward. Do not stop, do not linger in your journey, but strive for the mark set before you

Quote.Author: George Whitefield
Quote.QuoteValue: The Judge is before the door: he that cometh will come, and will not tarry: his reward is with him

Quote.Author: George Whitefield
Quote.QuoteValue: At the day of judgment we shall all meet again

Quote.Author: George Whitefield
Quote.QuoteValue: The reason why the Son of God took upon him our nature, was, the fall of our first parents

Quote.Author: George Whitefield
Quote.QuoteValue: No, the religion of Jesus is a social religion

Quote.Author: George Will
Quote.QuoteValue: The future has a way of arriving unannounced

Quote.Author: George Will
Quote.QuoteValue: Voters don't decide issues, they decide who will decide issues

Quote.Author: George Will
Quote.QuoteValue: If your job is to leaven ordinary lives with elevating spectacle, be elevating or be gone

Quote.Author: George Will
Quote.QuoteValue: Conservatives define themselves in terms of what they oppose

Quote.Author: George Will
Quote.QuoteValue: There may be more poetry than justice in poetic justice

Quote.Author: George Will
Quote.QuoteValue: Pessimism is as American as apple pie - frozen apple pie with a slice of processed cheese

Quote.Author: George Will
Quote.QuoteValue: Being elected to Congress is regarded as being sent on a looting raid for one's friends

Quote.Author: George Will
Quote.QuoteValue: The pursuit of perfection often impedes improvement

Quote.Author: George Will
Quote.QuoteValue: All politicians are to some extent salesmen

Quote.Author: George Will
Quote.QuoteValue: The strongest continuous thread in America's political tradition is skepticism about government

Quote.Author: Georges Bernanos
Quote.QuoteValue: The first sign of corruption in a society that is still alive is that the end justifies the means

Quote.Author: Georges Bernanos
Quote.QuoteValue: Hope is a risk that must be run

Quote.Author: Georges Bernanos
Quote.QuoteValue: No one ever discovers the depths of his own loneliness

Quote.Author: Georges Bernanos
Quote.QuoteValue: Hell, madam, is to love no longer

Quote.Author: Georges Bernanos
Quote.QuoteValue: A poor man with nothing in his belly needs hope, illusion, more than bread

Quote.Author: Georges Bernanos
Quote.QuoteValue: It is the perpetual dread of fear, the fear of fear, that shapes the face of a brave man

Quote.Author: Georges Bernanos
Quote.QuoteValue: The modern state no longer has anything but rights; it does not recognize duties any more

Quote.Author: Georges Bernanos
Quote.QuoteValue: Faith is not a thing which one 'loses', we merely cease to shape our lives by it

Quote.Author: Georges Bernanos
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a fine thing to rise above pride, but you must have pride in order to do so

Quote.Author: Georges Bernanos
Quote.QuoteValue: Who are you to condemn another's sin? He who condemns sin becomes part of it, espouses it

Quote.Author: Gerald R. Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: Tell the truth, work hard, and come to dinner on time

Quote.Author: Gerald R. Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: I know I am getting better at golf because I am hitting fewer spectators

Quote.Author: Gerald R. Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a Ford, not a Lincoln

Quote.Author: Gerald R. Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: When a man is asked to make a speech, the first thing he has to decide is what to say

Quote.Author: Gerald R. Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: My fellow Americans, our long national nightmare is over

Quote.Author: Gerald R. Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: Our constitution works. Our great republic is a government of laws, not of men

Quote.Author: Gerald R. Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: I would hope that understanding and reconciliation are not limited to the 19th hole alone

Quote.Author: Gerald R. Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: If Lincoln were alive today, he'd be turning over in his grave

Quote.Author: Gerald R. Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: I have had a lot of adversaries in my political life, but no enemies that I can remember

Quote.Author: Gerald R. Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a lot of experience with people smarter than I am

Quote.Author: Geraldine Ferraro
Quote.QuoteValue: You people married to Italian men, you know what it's like

Quote.Author: Geraldine Ferraro
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't have to have fought in a war to love peace

Quote.Author: Geraldine Ferraro
Quote.QuoteValue: President Reagan's one-liners were terrific

Quote.Author: Geraldine Ferraro
Quote.QuoteValue: What are my sources of strength? My husband and my three kids, my health-care team, and my religion

Quote.Author: Geraldine Ferraro
Quote.QuoteValue: If you think somebody cares about you and believes your life is worth saving, how can you give up?

Quote.Author: Geraldine Ferraro
Quote.QuoteValue: Vice president - it has such a nice ring to it!

Quote.Author: Geraldine Ferraro
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like to practice ahead of time what I'm going to say

Quote.Author: Geraldine Ferraro
Quote.QuoteValue: If you ask me a question, don't tell me what the question is in advance, 'cause I'd rather not know

Quote.Author: Geraldine Ferraro
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't look very sensitive and they didn't know me very well

Quote.Author: Geraldine Ferraro
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't serve on a committee that dealt with foreign policy

Quote.Author: Gerard Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: I love doing the stunts. It's as simple as that

Quote.Author: Gerard Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: I wear a lot of Brioni and Ferragamo and Dolce, all of those kind of things

Quote.Author: Gerard Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: I had to prove myself to a lot of different people

Quote.Author: Gerard Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: I went from somebody who didn't sing to somebody who didn't speak

Quote.Author: Gerard Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: Manscaping and all of that is not my thing. I'm more of the Clint Eastwood kind of guy

Quote.Author: Gerard Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: Funnily enough, when I originally went in for my screen test, that set was already built

Quote.Author: Gerard Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: My manager and my agents, they go over my contracts

Quote.Author: Gerard Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: I always find stuff in my characters to relate to

Quote.Author: Gerard Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: 9/11 was basically caused by box cutters, and that changed the world

Quote.Author: Gerard Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: I have literally run into 20 people all around the world with my face tattooed on them

Quote.Author: Gerard Way
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not psycho... I just like psychotic things

Quote.Author: Gerard Way
Quote.QuoteValue: Cigarettes and coffee: an alcoholic's best friend!

Quote.Author: Gerard Way
Quote.QuoteValue: 'The Black Parade' is an epic, theatrical, orchestral, big record that is also a concept album

Quote.Author: Gerard Way
Quote.QuoteValue: You should love yourself

Quote.Author: Gerard Way
Quote.QuoteValue: The clearest actions come from truth, not obligation

Quote.Author: Gerard Way
Quote.QuoteValue: My Chemical Romance is done. But it can never die

Quote.Author: Gerard Way
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing I learnt in high school is that people are very violent and territorial

Quote.Author: Gerard Way
Quote.QuoteValue: My music is - I don't want to say my main focus, but it's what comes most naturally to me

Quote.Author: Gerard Way
Quote.QuoteValue: It is often my nature to be abstract, hidden in plain sight, or nowhere at all

Quote.Author: Gerard Way
Quote.QuoteValue: Heroes are ordinary people who make themselves extraordinary

Quote.Author: Germaine Greer
Quote.QuoteValue: You're only young once, but you can be immature forever

Quote.Author: Germaine Greer
Quote.QuoteValue: Revolution is the festival of the oppressed

Quote.Author: Germaine Greer
Quote.QuoteValue: The management of fertility is one of the most important functions of adulthood

Quote.Author: Germaine Greer
Quote.QuoteValue: Freud is the father of psychoanalysis. It had no mother

Quote.Author: Germaine Greer
Quote.QuoteValue: The tragedy of machismo is that a man is never quite man enough

Quote.Author: Germaine Greer
Quote.QuoteValue: Act quickly, think slowly

Quote.Author: Germaine Greer
Quote.QuoteValue: One may not reach the dawn save by the path of the night

Quote.Author: Germaine Greer
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no such thing as security. There never has been

Quote.Author: Germaine Greer
Quote.QuoteValue: The essence of pleasure is spontaneity

Quote.Author: Germaine Greer
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't fight to get women out from behind vacuum cleaners to get them onto the board of Hoover

Quote.Author: Gerry Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: We have to make sure the Good Friday Agreement works

Quote.Author: Gerry Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: But I also hold the very strong view that republicans need to lead by example

Quote.Author: Gerry Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: The catalyst for much of this change is the growing support for republicanism

Quote.Author: Gerry Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: One man's transparency is another's humiliation

Quote.Author: Gerry Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: Making peace, I have found, is much harder than making war

Quote.Author: Gerry Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: The days of humiliation, of second-class citizens and of inequality are over and gone forever

Quote.Author: Gerry Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: If you militarise a situation, you beg for an armed response

Quote.Author: Gerry Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: The Irish Republican Army has kept every commitment made by its leadership

Quote.Author: Gerry Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: You can only judge anything that happened in the times, in the times that that happened

Quote.Author: Gerry Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: For good or ill, I'm a person of leadership. I do my best. I don't dodge responsibility

Quote.Author: Gerry Cooney
Quote.QuoteValue: Am I complicated? Nah, I'm interesting. I just like having a good time

Quote.Author: Gerry Cooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I've spent most of my life in prison. I was a prisoner of my fear and my low self-esteem

Quote.Author: Gerry Cooney
Quote.QuoteValue: Boxing was not the sport that I thought is was due to all the politics

Quote.Author: Gerry Cooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I am seeing all the guys, like Earnie Shavers, Tex Cobb, and Larry Holmes all the time

Quote.Author: Gerry Cooney
Quote.QuoteValue: When somebody used to compliment me, I'd spend 10 minutes trying to talk them out of it

Quote.Author: Gerry Cooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like a pro now. Before I fought Holmes, I felt like a rookie

Quote.Author: Gerry Cooney
Quote.QuoteValue: The past is yesterday. I'm looking forward to tomorrow

Quote.Author: Gerry Cooney
Quote.QuoteValue: Drug abuse is a very difficult disease

Quote.Author: Gerry Cooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I see Mike Tyson as too strong for Spinks

Quote.Author: Gerry Cooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had a long, long road with lots of ups and downs. But that's all behind me now

Quote.Author: Gerry Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: Importantly, I still give money to homeless people - and all other charities

Quote.Author: Gerry Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: There are plenty of people smarter than you by a long way. I just got lucky

Quote.Author: Gerry Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no Internet business in furniture or bedding. Zero - practically in the world

Quote.Author: Gerry Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: I still have a fear about going broke. I always think about it

Quote.Author: Gerry Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: People don't just come to work to make money; they need satisfaction

Quote.Author: Gerry Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe you should help people

Quote.Author: Gerry Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a commonsense sort of a person, and I don't get carried away with emotion and fears

Quote.Author: Gerry Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: What I think is that we should be helping people so they can reach an even greater potential

Quote.Author: Gerry Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll be amazed in my lifetime if my business gets to being 5 per cent online

Quote.Author: Gerry Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: That's not in my nature to run away - I'll stand up and fight

Quote.Author: Gertrude Stein
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody gets so much information all day long that they lose their common sense

Quote.Author: Gertrude Stein
Quote.QuoteValue: Rose is a rose is a rose is a rose

Quote.Author: Gertrude Stein
Quote.QuoteValue: The deepest thing in any one is the conviction of the bad luck that follows boasting

Quote.Author: Gertrude Stein
Quote.QuoteValue: What is the answer? In that case, what is the question?

Quote.Author: Gertrude Stein
Quote.QuoteValue: It is the soothing thing about history that it does repeat itself

Quote.Author: Gertrude Stein
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone gets so much information all day long that they lose their common sense

Quote.Author: Gertrude Stein
Quote.QuoteValue: A diary means yes indeed

Quote.Author: Gertrude Stein
Quote.QuoteValue: This is the lesson that history teaches: repetition

Quote.Author: Gertrude Stein
Quote.QuoteValue: Before the flowers of friendship faded friendship faded

Quote.Author: Gertrude Stein
Quote.QuoteValue: America is my country and Paris is my hometown

Quote.Author: GG Allin
Quote.QuoteValue: My demons and I are not compatible. We never have been and never will be

Quote.Author: GG Allin
Quote.QuoteValue: My demons, inner strengths and physical battles have guided me through life

Quote.Author: GG Allin
Quote.QuoteValue: Rock'n'roll has to be destroyed and rebuilt in my name if it's ever gonna accomplish anything

Quote.Author: GG Allin
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate everybody

Quote.Author: GG Allin
Quote.QuoteValue: No one comes to my shows so they'll feel safe and comfortable

Quote.Author: GG Allin
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe I am the highest power, absolutely

Quote.Author: GG Allin
Quote.QuoteValue: I am in control at all times

Quote.Author: GG Allin
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to see anyone do what I do for one week

Quote.Author: GG Allin
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe you can make forces of good and evil work for you, to get what you want

Quote.Author: Gia Coppola
Quote.QuoteValue: So many of the kids on television have really nice clothes, perfect skin and hair

Quote.Author: Gia Coppola
Quote.QuoteValue: Chanel is a brand that is so inspiring

Quote.Author: Gia Coppola
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to be a bartender for a bit

Quote.Author: Gia Coppola
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a lot of game apps I need to delete

Quote.Author: Gia Coppola
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the pharmacy makeup. I always get stuck in that aisle... I've always liked looking at it

Quote.Author: Gia Coppola
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been going to the same person for haircuts since I was thirteen

Quote.Author: Gia Coppola
Quote.QuoteValue: Now that I'm older, I have a much better appreciation of nature, and I love being alone

Quote.Author: Gia Coppola
Quote.QuoteValue: It's great because all of my friends from elementary school are still my closest friends

Quote.Author: Gia Coppola
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't host an Italian film festival without Marcello Mastroianni. It just doesn't feel right

Quote.Author: Gia Coppola
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to play with the gadgets that come with film

Quote.Author: Giada De Laurentiis
Quote.QuoteValue: Pasta doesn't make you fat. How much pasta you eat makes you fat

Quote.Author: Giada De Laurentiis
Quote.QuoteValue: I have been blessed with a good, fun, and wonderful life, but I've also seen a whole lot of pain

Quote.Author: Giada De Laurentiis
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything in moderation

Quote.Author: Giada De Laurentiis
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in the kitchen, mostly with my grandfather, my mother and my aunt Raffy

Quote.Author: Giada De Laurentiis
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm most comfortable in T-shirts, but they have to have some style to them

Quote.Author: Giada De Laurentiis
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother and I, our favorite part of any baked pasta is the top, where the cheese gets crusty

Quote.Author: Giada De Laurentiis
Quote.QuoteValue: Talking to other people while you're cooking, it doesn't come naturally

Quote.Author: Giada De Laurentiis
Quote.QuoteValue: I think you can tell the food is close to my heart, too, because I'm doing what I do best

Quote.Author: Giada De Laurentiis
Quote.QuoteValue: Attitudes toward food have completely changed

Quote.Author: Giada De Laurentiis
Quote.QuoteValue: I was so nervous to turn 40, but the last year and a half has been the most fun I have ever had

Quote.Author: Gianni Versace
Quote.QuoteValue: In the past, people were born royal. Nowadays, royalty comes from what you do

Quote.Author: Gianni Versace
Quote.QuoteValue: It is nice to have valid competition; it pushes you to do better

Quote.Author: Gianni Versace
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a fantastic relationship with money. I use it to buy my freedom

Quote.Author: Gianni Versace
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the body. I like to design everything to do with the body

Quote.Author: Gianni Versace
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a little like Marco Polo, going around and mixing cultures

Quote.Author: Gianni Versace
Quote.QuoteValue: Designing came to me. I didn't have to move

Quote.Author: Gianni Versace
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not interested in the past, except as the road to the future

Quote.Author: Gianni Versace
Quote.QuoteValue: My dream was always to be a composer, but fashion came very easily

Quote.Author: Gianni Versace
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to contrast; life today is full of contrast... We have to change

Quote.Author: Gianni Versace
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's the responsibility of a designer to try to break rules and barriers

Quote.Author: Gil Scot
Quote.QuoteValue: eron - My songs were always about the tone of voice rather than the words

Quote.Author: Gil Scot
Quote.QuoteValue: eron - Our accomplishments show what kind of people we are

Quote.Author: Gil Scot
Quote.QuoteValue: eron - The revolution that takes place in your head, nobody will ever see that

Quote.Author: Gil Scot
Quote.QuoteValue: eron - You have to learn and keep learning

Quote.Author: Gil Scot
Quote.QuoteValue: eron - Every show that sells out is like a hero's welcome for me

Quote.Author: Gil Scot
Quote.QuoteValue: eron - I cannot afford to watch Fox News

Quote.Author: Gil Scot
Quote.QuoteValue: eron - Womenfolk raised me, and I was full-grown before I knew I came from a broken home

Quote.Author: Gil Scot
Quote.QuoteValue: eron - If you aren't having no fun, die, because you're running a worthless program, far as I'm concerned

Quote.Author: Gil Scot
Quote.QuoteValue: eron - I am honestly not sure how capable I am of love. And I'm not sure why

Quote.Author: Gil Scot
Quote.QuoteValue: eron - I was a piano player before I was a poet

Quote.Author: Gilbert Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: We needed something to express our joy, our beauty, our power. And the rainbow did that

Quote.Author: Gilbert Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: What the rainbow has given our people is a thing that connects us

Quote.Author: Gilbert Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: A rainbow is something in the sky, so a rainbow flag fits

Quote.Author: Gilbert Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: The rainbow flag is a symbol of freedom and liberation that we made for ourselves

Quote.Author: Gilbert Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: I was afraid my family would lock me up and give me electroshock. I was a screaming queen

Quote.Author: Gilbert Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents and I didn't speak for 10 years. It took a long time to rebuild that relationship

Quote.Author: Gilbert Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: That's really how I ended up making the first flag - I was the guy who could sew it

Quote.Author: Gilbert Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: When I fell in love, all the shame and guilt I carried with me for years suddenly vanished

Quote.Author: Gilbert Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: Flags are about proclaiming power... that visibility is key to our success and to our justice

Quote.Author: Gilbert Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: Flags say something. You put a rainbow flag on your windshield, and you're saying something

Quote.Author: Gilbert Gottfried
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, I'm eventually gonna take the Daryl Hannah parts

Quote.Author: Gilbert Gottfried
Quote.QuoteValue: No, generally I think influence is used as a nice word for plagiarism

Quote.Author: Gilbert Gottfried
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, I play Jews and parrots. Parrots are how I've branched out

Quote.Author: Gilbert Gottfried
Quote.QuoteValue: Unfortunately, I've never been mistaken as Johnny Depp

Quote.Author: Gilbert Gottfried
Quote.QuoteValue: If the police ever try to pick me up, Michael Jackson told me I can hide out at his house

Quote.Author: Gilbert Gottfried
Quote.QuoteValue: I would show up at a party for Al Qaeda if you said there's going to be a dinner

Quote.Author: Gilbert Gottfried
Quote.QuoteValue: You never know what people will choose to be offended by

Quote.Author: Gilbert Gottfried
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd make Jack Benny look like a philanthropist

Quote.Author: Gilbert Gottfried
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm used to explaining to people why my jokes were funny

Quote.Author: Gilbert Gottfried
Quote.QuoteValue: If someone else is paying for it, food just tastes a lot better

Quote.Author: Gilda Radner
Quote.QuoteValue: Some stories don't have a clear beginning, middle and end

Quote.Author: Gilda Radner
Quote.QuoteValue: I base most of my fashion taste on what doesn't itch

Quote.Author: Gilda Radner
Quote.QuoteValue: Dreams are like paper, they tear so easily

Quote.Author: Gilda Radner
Quote.QuoteValue: I can always be distracted by love, but eventually I get horny for my creativity

Quote.Author: Gilda Radner
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no real security except for whatever you build inside yourself
